snippet: ChemChina [CNNCC.UL] said on Monday that Beijing had accepted its application for regulatory approval of its $43 billion takeover of Syngenta last month....

headline.main: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses
headline.print_headline: Aberdeen CEO Says Standard Life Deal Will Lead to Some Job Losses

lead_paragraph: ChemChina [CNNCC.UL] said on Monday that Beijing had accepted its application for regulatory approval of its $43 billion takeover of Syngenta last month.
